title: Avicus User Exposed for HACKING on The Chunk

replies.body: This post has no relation to Avicus at all, exposes a server IP Address, and this player is just spinning his mouse on high sensitivity. Makes no sense why you would create a forum post about yourself on another server, so this is technically spam.
